metadata.title: CVE-2017-16854 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) through 3.3.20, 4 through 4.0.26, 5through 5.0.24, and 6 through 6.0.1, an attacker who is logged in as acustomer can use the ticket search form to disclose internal articleinformation of their customer tickets.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
